attributes.action: car insurance quotes raised no more than 10% of previous years cost
attributes.additional_details:
The recent huge bumps to car insurance on people that have never had an accident therefore have never made a claim and have a clean licence are unfair and utterly ridiculous

I propose that those who fall into the bracket of no claims and still have a clean licence be protected from these money grabbing insurance companies

I propose a law to cap to at most a 10% raise of your previous years car insurance if you are renewing to the same company and you have no reason for your insurance to go up.

rejection.details: Insurance premiums are a matter for the industry.
